EmailTemplate.subject: Activate the Power of Cloud Foundry with Pivotal Web Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You know it. We know it. Deploying code to production early and often enables you to better understand customer needs and grow your business. Most cloud platforms force you to hire or become an operational expert on:
- Server setup and assembling software stacks using templates - Networking, operational scaling, and rolling out updates - HA and log management - Adding “scale-aware” code to your app
Try Pivotal Web Services <https://run.pivotal.io/?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paas-outreach> instead. Run by the Cloud Foundry experts, Pivotal Web Services lets you:
- Simply upload your files and your app just works. Try it <http://docs.run.pivotal.io/starting/?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paas-outreach> - Meet demand by scaling your app <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NCk0iq3hsYs> in seconds - Rest easy - failed apps are restarted in seconds <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHMdmYJRX1A> - Automate zero down-time deployments <https://spring.io/blog/2014/04/04/project-sagan-zero-downtime-deployments> - Go to one log API <http://docs.run.pivotal.io/devguide/deploy-apps/streaming-logs.html?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paas-outreach> for all app and user events
- 1-click add popular services - MySQL, MongoDB <http://docs.run.pivotal.io/marketplace/services/mongolab.html?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paas-outreach>, Redis <http://docs.run.pivotal.io/marketplace/services/rediscloud.html?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paas-outreach>, SendGrid <http://blog.gopivotal.com/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/sending-email-from-cloud-foundry-java-applications-with-sendgrid?utm_source=Pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pivotal-email-paas-nurture-q22014>, New Relic <http://blog.gopivotal.com/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/monitoring-cloud-foundry-applications-with-new-relic?utm_source=Pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pivotal-email-paas-nurture-q22014"><span class=> SIGN UP NOW! <https://run.pivotal.io/?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=paas-outreach> We’re excited to share the power of Cloud Foundry with developers who value simplicity and scale.
cf-push, The Pivotal Web Services Team
